title: Drag-and-drop for columns and cards
description: Implement drag-and-drop so cards can be moved between columns and reordered within a column. Columns themselves should also be reorderable via drag-and-drop.

title: Board layout with three default columns
description: Render a single board view with three columns: Todo, In Progress, Done. Columns should display their titles and serve as containers for cards. Board and column state should be managed in application state.
close_reason: Implemented board layout with three default columns (Todo, In Progress, Done), Board and Column components, TypeScript types, and base styles.

title: Kanban Board App
description: Single-board kanban application with drag-and-drop columns and cards, CRUD operations, and localStorage persistence. See SPEC.md for full requirements.

title: Card CRUD operations
description: Add ability to create, read, edit, and delete cards within columns. Each card has a title (required) and description (optional). Cards maintain their order within a column.
